additional_info: Finally a solution, found here: github more and more unusable - disappearing file listings [GitHub] It seems solve these issues. Resume of the GitHub post by Martin Walter as "walmar": Replace the Polly extension with the attached latest unofficial version 1.9#mod2022-12-20. The zakius@polly.zip (latest unofficial version 1.9#mod2022-12-20) file should be renamed to zakius@polly.xpi after download. Note of me: And you can install it by dropping it on Waterfox. What's new in this latest Polly unofficial version 1.9#mod2022-12-20: A - Its updated Webcomponents-Bundle.js polyfill. B - It adds options - Webcomponents-pf_dom.js and Webcomponents-pf_js.js Which already seem to be part of the updated Webcomponents-Bundle.js polyfill. - Intl.RelativeTimeFormat.js That is preferred for dates by GitHub pages (AND for my request here !). Same version in different places: - Greasy Fork - Fix for problem with [datetime] for Waterfox Clasic [Standalone] (Userstyles.World - USw): - Greasy Fork - Fix for problem with [datetime] - Useryles.org - Greasy Fork - Fix for problem with [datetime] and Waterfox Clasic [Standalone]- GreasyFork
